description:
We are excited to announce our June meetup which will be all around Leveraging Cloud Computing for Increased Sustainability.

This will be held in central Bristol on June 29th, kicking off at 6:30pm for food and drinks.

**Speakers:**
Will Rowley – Azure Core Lead – Energy @ Microsoft
Caoimhin Graham – Cloud Practice Lead @ Kainos
TBC – Speaker from AWS
Facilitator - Independent Vendor - TBC

**Agenda:**
\- Kick\-off at 6:30 for Pizza and Beerrs \+ Soft Drinks
\- SR2 and Meetup intro at 7pm
\- Panel discussion with a brief break in the middle
\- Wrap up around 8:15 \- 8:30pm with Q&A

Topics and the evening discussion will follow shortly but be sure to RSVP to stay updated with new details.

Join the Slack channel to interact and chat with other community members! -
https://join.slack.com/t/bristol-cn-and-devops/shared_invite/zt-1um80612s-tl1cw9V0qnoIVdD6hypyLw
title: Leveraging Cloud Computing for Increased Sustainability
